markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Death](/Rules.aspx?ID=1968)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 186 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Most blighted boons affect those who die under the boon's effects in special, unusual ways, as noted in a boon's description. Also, every blighted boon destroys a user who uses the boon's power too long. This doom varies in form.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Death
search_markdown:
<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 186 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

Game Master's Trove / Blighted Boons / Progression
</additional-info>
text: Death Source Treasure Vault pg. 186 1.1 Most blighted boons affect those who die under the boon's effects in special, unusual ways, as noted in a boon's description. Also, every blighted boon destroys a user who uses the boon's power too long. This doom varies in form.
